text: One night, he said, "let's just follow it through." #LifeTheUniverseAndEverything

passages.full_quote: <used>One night, he said, a</used> spaceship appeared in the sky of a planet which had never seen one before

They tried not to listen, but could not help noticing that Slartibartfast was querulously demanding that he be given the silver urn containing the Ashes, as they were, <used>he said, "v</used>itally important for the past, present and future safety of the Galaxy", and that this was causing wild hilarity

passages.source_name: So Long And Thanks For All The Fish

passages.full_quote: "Come on, you two," the shape <used>said, "let's</used> be having you."
"All right, all right," said Richard, holding up his pa<used>lms, "let's just follow it through</used>"
